title: client quit responding then I got a login error after reopening it
body:
Edit: I'm now in a login queue so i think it works now :D

Edit 2: well i logged in but the client is still unresponsive

replies.body: We're aware of some service incidents that happened last night. They were resolved later in the evening shortly before our scheduled maintenance began. If you continue to have issues after logging in, please let me know and I'll be glad to assist further.
ty... And I logged in and played a couple games with no issue this morning so I'm not having anymore issues :D
